title: Chicory, gorgonzola and walnut salad
ingredients: ['125ml cider vinegar', '4 tablespoons cranberries', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1/8 teaspoon sea salt', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper', '2 heads romaine lettuce, rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces', '2 medium heads chicory, washed, dried and chopped', '2 pears', '55g toasted walnuts, chopped', '85g Gorgonzola cheese, crumbled']
